titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Windsor before his Majesty, the second Sunday after Easter, 1684. by John Archbishop of Tuam.
titleStmt.author: Vesey, John, 1636-1716.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Clavel ... and are to be sold by Samuel Helsham bookseller in Dublin,

notesStmt.note: On t.p.: "Published by his Majesties special command."
Reproduction of original in: Trinty College (Dublin, Ireland) Library.
